Sense | Cambridge, MA | Full-time | Onsite

Sense is a home energy monitor that lets homeowners understand their energy use and know what's happening at home by showing them what devices are on in their house and how much energy each device uses in real-time. It's a simple box that is installed in your electric panel and a smartphone app.

We are an early-stage company of about 20 people, VC backed, and ready to grow the team! We are currently hiring for: * Product / UX Designer * Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer

Email ryan@sense.com or apply at: https://sense.com/careers.html
